Name: Fragment of Statue with Magical Inscriptions
Description: This fragment of a statue depicts scenes of various deities such as Hathor, Khepri, Sobek, Horus, and Isis. Next to these scenes are vertical magical hieroglyphic texts describing how scorpion stings could be cured. The statue stood on a base with a small basin, and magical spells entirely covered their surfaces. It is thought that water would be poured into the basin and the affected person would drink it to heal the sting.
